  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller.GameController

      class GameController extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • game
          Game game
          This attribute represents the game that the game controller controls
        • ID
          int ID
          This attribute represents the ID of the game controller
        • isDebug
          boolean isDebug
          This attribute represents the execution type
        • playersToWait
          ArrayList<Player> playersToWait
          This attribute represents the list of players that need to do an action, used only in the game preparation phase

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller.MainController

      class MainController extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameOnCreation
          boolean gameOnCreation
          This attribute represents a game that is being created
        • gamesControllers
          Map<Integer,GameController> gamesControllers
          This attribute represents the list of game controllers of started games and id of that game controller
        • invalidNickname
          boolean invalidNickname
          This attribute represents a boolean for checking if a client sent an invalid nickname
        • lock
          Boolean lock
          This lock is used to synchronize the reading of threadStated
        • maxNumWaitingClients
          int maxNumWaitingClients
          This attribute represents the number of player that needs to wait until a game is created
        • numberOfTotalGames
          int numberOfTotalGames
          This attribute represents the number of games
        • threadStarted
          boolean threadStarted
          This attribute represents the executor current state
        • waitingPlayers
          ArrayList<Player> waitingPlayers
          This attribute represents the list of players who are waiting for a new game

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.card_side.Corner

      class Corner extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • isEvil
          boolean isEvil
          This attribute equals true if there is no corner in the card
        • isHidden
          boolean isHidden
          This attribute equals true if the corner is hidden by another corner in the player's board
        • symbol
          Symbol symbol
          This attribute represents the symbol in the corner. Symbol is empty if there is no symbol in the card.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.card_side.Side

      class Side extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • DOWNLEFT
          Corner DOWNLEFT
          This attribute represent the corner in the down left
        • DOWNRIGHT
          Corner DOWNRIGHT
          This attribute represents the corner in the down right
        • imagePath
          String imagePath
          this attribute represents the path where the side's image is located
        • permanentResources
          ArrayList<Symbol> permanentResources
          This attribute represents the resources that cannot be covered by other cards, therefore these resources are permanent
        • points
          int points
          This attribute represents the points given by this side
        • requestedResources
          Map<Symbol,Integer> requestedResources
          This attribute represent the resources that must be visible in the Player's board to be able to play this card
        • sideSymbol
          Symbol sideSymbol
          This attribute represents the card's color (and the kingdom)
        • type
          int type
          This attribute represents the type for Mission Cards
        • UPLEFT
          Corner UPLEFT
          This attribute represent the corner in the up left
        • UPRIGHT
          Corner UPRIGHT
          This attribute represents the corner in the up right

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.player.PersonalBoard

      class PersonalBoard extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blockedPositions
          ArrayList<Point> blockedPositions
          This attribute represents the positions where no card can be placed.
        • nickname
          String nickname
          This attribute represents the player's nickname.
        • observable
          ModelObservable observable
          This attribute represents the observable used to notify the client.
        • occupiedPositions
          ArrayList<Point> occupiedPositions
          This attribute represents the positions where a card has been placed.
        • playablePositions
          ArrayList<Point> playablePositions
          This attribute represents the positions where a card car be placed.
        • score
          int score
          This attribute represents the score for this personal board (that is associated to a player). From 0 to 30.
        • secretMission
          Card secretMission
          This attribute represents the secret mission chosen.
        • selectedX
          int selectedX
          This attribute represents the coordinate X of the selected position.
        • selectedY
          int selectedY
          This attribute represents the coordinate Y of the selected position.
        • visibleResources
          Map<Symbol,Integer> visibleResources
          This attribute represents the visible resources in the board.
        • xMax
          int xMax
          This attribute represents the personal board's dimension. It can be a negative number.
        • xMin
          int xMin
          This attribute represents the personal board's dimension. It can be a negative number.
        • yMax
          int yMax
          This attribute represents the personal board's dimension. It can be a negative number.
        • yMin
          int yMin
          This attribute represents the personal board's dimension. It can be a negative number.

          boolean amIFirstPlayer
          This attribute represent whether the player is the first one

          This attribute represents the player's hand

          String ID
          This attributes represents the player with a unique id

          String nickname
          This attribute represents the player's name and will be shown to the other players

          ModelObservable observable
          Observable to notify client

          Pawn pawnColor
          This attribute represents the pawn, which represent the player in the board

          PersonalBoard personalBoard
          This attribute represents the player's personal board
        • secretMissionHand
          Hand secretMissionHand
          This attribute represents the player's secret mission hand (used only in the initial game state)

          PlayerState state
          This attribute represents the player's state

      class Point extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • flags
          Map<Integer,Boolean> flags
          This attribute is a flag to mark when a card has already been used for a certain mission

          This attribute represents the side of the card played in a specific point
        • x
          int x
          These attributes represent the coordinates x and y of the Cartesian Plane

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.request.game_request.AddMessageRequest

      class AddMessageRequest extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • message
          String message
          Message to be added in the chat
        • receiverNickname
          String receiverNickname
          Player who is going to receive the message. Empty string if is a group message.
        • senderID
          String senderID
          Player's Unique ID. Must be not null.
        • time
          String time
          Local time of client.
